name: Neat-o-math
description:
Help Captain Neat-O on his quest by answering math questions. 

Created for Toy Box Jam 3 and for my daughter.

The cartridge uses only the sprites, sfx and music from the toy boxes, and the code for the sprite print function (modified). 

(I did decrypt two of the secret zips, but didn't use any of the stuff in there). 

This game is obviously intended for kids learning their multiplication tables (i.e. my daughter), but it could be extended with more interesting challenges.

Lots of thanks to That Tom Hall and the other TBJ3 organizers and contributors!

PS: this Pico-8 cartridge requires a keyboard.
